title: FS: c1880 H 804-7B Set *Rare Blue & Yellow*SOLD*

posts.post_title: FS: c1880 H 804-7B Set *Rare Blue & Yellow*SOLD*
posts.post_content:
Remarkably Bright in Color & Condition...

Although the Black & Red H 804-7A's are quite common, the Blue & Yellow's are a different subject. 

To find a Really Nice Complete Set of the H 804-7B with All of the Same Backs is even Rarer! 

*SOLD*
